server.title: Servers

server.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this server?

environmentAgent.title: Environment Agents
environmentAgent.name: Environment Name
environmentAgent.tokenWarning: This Token is displayed only once, please copy and save it immediately! The Token is used for server agent client to connect to the server. If lost, you need to delete the agent and recreate it.
environmentAgent.regenerateTokenConfirm: Are you sure to regenerate token? The old token will be invalid
environmentAgent.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this environment agent?
environmentAgent.step1: Copy the Token above and save it to a secure location
environmentAgent.step2: Download and install EZDP Server Agent client on your server
environmentAgent.step3: Configure the Token in the Agent configuration file and start the Agent
